titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Norfolk County, Collection of English Deedsca. 1409-ca.1826
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by Edited JAV, 2005

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Norfolk County, Collection of English Deeds

address.addressline: Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

did.abstract: Primarily property deeds. Also contains some wills and related documents.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Norfolk County, Collection of English Deeds, [Box #, Folder #], Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: English deeds, wills and related documents from Norfolk, fifteenth to nineteenth- centuries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
